data.text: Mad Nyasaye aa malo, mad wasike ke;
Mad iriembgi gi dhi mabor,
To joma kare to mad bed mamor
Weruru ne Nyasaye, weruru wende pak ne nyinge,
Nyasaye modak kare kama ler.
Nyasaye keto joma odongʼ kendgi e udi
Kane iwuok idhi kitelo ne jogi, yaye Nyasaye,
piny noyiengni
Ne ichiwo koth mogundho, yaye Nyasaye;
Jogi nokawo pinyno modakie kendo nichiwo ne joma odhier gik ma gilando,
Ruoth nolando wach kendo oganda mane okawo wachno
“Ruodhi gi jolweny dar gi ngʼwech;
Kata mana sa ma inindo but mach kama liet,
Kane Jal Maratego okeyo ruodhi manie piny,
Gode mag Bashan gin gode madongo miwuoro;
Angʼo momiyo ungʼicho gi nyiego, yaye gode mojuothore,
Geche mag lweny mag Nyasaye gin tara gi tara;
Kane iidho idhi malo
Pak odog ne Ruoth, ma en Nyasaye ma Jawarwa,
Nyasachwa en Nyasaye ma waro ji;
Kuom adier, Nyasaye biro toyo wiye wasike,
Ruoth wacho niya, “Abiro gologi oko Bashan;
mondo unyum tiendeu e remb joma kedo kodu,
Wuodhi koro nenore maler, yaye Nyasaye,
Joma wer gi dhogi otelo eka joma wer ka goyo thumbe luwogi,
Pakuru Nyasaye e dier chokruok maduongʼ;
Dhoot matin mar joka Benjamin otelonegi,
Chok tekoni kaachiel, yaye Nyasaye; nyiswa tekoni,
Nikech hekalu mari man Jerusalem
Kwer ondiek manie dier togo,
Joote biro biro koa Misri;
Weruru ne Nyasaye, yaye pinjeruodhi mag piny,
werneuru ne Jal mariembo gechene e kor polo malo manyaka nene,
Landuru teko mar Nyasaye
Ilich miwuoro ka in kari maler, yaye Nyasaye,
